item.title: Reply to 'How to stop "setInterval"' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1831152/how-to-stop-setinterval:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'How to stop "setInterval"' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1831152/how-to-stop-setinterval:

setInterval returns an id that you can use to cancel the interval with clearInterval()
